definitions.text: any venturesome undertaking especially one with an uncertain outcome
an investment that is very risky but could yield great profits
examples: he knew the stock was a speculation when he bought it

definitions.text: a commercial undertaking that risks a loss but promises a profit
proceed somewhere despite the risk of possible dangers
examples: We ventured into the world of high-tech and bought a supercomputer

definitions.text: put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation
examples: I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again
I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong
I will stake my good reputation for this
